description:
The Perfect Pitch is an 8-Step process that will set you up for a successful interaction; whether writing an email to a friend or colleague, or making a cold call to a prospective client, The Perfect Pitch will be THE reason you get a higher response rate, more YESes, and start seeing much bigger results. Understand the importance of follow-up etiquette, learn how to make a powerful request so that you hear YES every time, and start to make this process a daily habit in all of your interactions.

Once you’ve used The Perfect Pitch in your outreach, cold calls, and requests, you’ll start to see how easy it is to get results… BIG results that will propel you forward!
title: The Perfect Pitch: How to Get a "Yes" Every Time
